Hero.subtitle2: 設計，Flash Payments 能夠為您的企業實現簡單、低成本的加密貨幣支付。設定只需 1 分鐘
Hero.tooltip1: 真正點對點意思是客戶直接付款給企業，沒有中間人。因此，Flash 不收取任何費用。
Hero.tooltip2: 因為 Flash 也不會從匯率中獲利，您和您的客戶將永遠獲得最佳的加密貨幣⮀{merchantCurrency}匯率。

How.title: 如何使用
How.step-1: 列印並顯示您的 QR Code
How.step-2: 客戶使用 MetaMask App 掃描並付款
How.step-3: 您在 Flash App 上確認付款
How.step-4: 您在 Flash App 轉帳到您的銀行
How.step-1-1: 設定帳戶後，您會收到 QR Code
How.step-2-1:
客戶掃描 QR Code 後，他們的MetaMask App?
MetaMask App 是收發加密貨幣最流行的App，全球有超過 5000 萬人在使用。
 會開啟
How.step-2-3: 客戶提交付款時，USDC幣（價值相等於輸入的{merchantCurrency}金額）會從客戶的 MetaMask app 送到您的 Flash app。
How.step-3-1: About 5 seconds after a customer pays, you should see the payment in the Flash app. Employees can also log into your Flash app (with restricted functions) on a shared or personal device to see successful payments
How.step-4-1: To transfer funds to your bank, you must have a Coinbase account (sign up here)
How.step-4-2: In the Flash app, click 'Link Coinbase Account'
How.step-4-3: Click 'Cash Out' and follow the on-screen instructions. USDC will be automatically converted to EUR* and the money sent to your bank (~0% fees)
How.step-4-4: Flash is designed so that you will not lose money from fluctuating exchange rates (how?)
How.mmTooltip: MetaMask is the most popular app to send/receive tokens and is used by 50+ million people worldwide.
How.usdcTooltip: 1 USDC token equals to 1 USD, as gauranteed by Circle. Almost all crypto users have USDC.
How.howTooltip: When a customer pays, our interface alters the USDC-{merchantCurrency} rate by 0.3% in favor of the business. So, you actually earn an extra 0.3%. In the long run, these extra earnings should offset any losses due to fluctuating rates, if you cash out frequently (~2x per month). Customers will not mind the extra 0.3% because the USDC-to-{merchantCurrency} rate offered by Flash is usually 1-5% better than the USD-to-{merchantCurrency} rate at any bank.
